# mobile-check
Python script to check if a contact number is in a valid format for India.

## Test cases
### PASS CASES
9988776655<br>
+919988776655<br>
+91 9988776655<br>
+91-9988776655<br>
+91 -9988776655<br>
+91- 9988776655<br>
+91 - 9988776655<br>
09988776655<br>
0 9988776655<br>
0-9988776655<br>
0 -9988776655<br>
0- 9988776655<br>
0 - 9988776655<br>

### FAIL CASES
99887766<br>
+9199887766<br>
+91 99887766<br>
+91-99887766<br>
+91 -99887766<br>
+91- 99887766<br>
+91 - 99887766<br>
099887766<br>
0 99887766<br>
0-99887766<br>
0 -99887766<br>
0- 99887766<br>
0 - 99887766<br>
